portfolio-2022.name: This Portfolio
portfolio-2022.description: This website was made using a Preact +  TypeScript starter template. It utilizes Tailwind CSS and Daisy UI for styled components.
portfolio-2022.imgAlt: screenshot of 8-bit multicolored sunset from portfolio homepage
portfolio-2022.subDescription1: I used Preact as a lightweight alternative to React ( 3.5kb vs. 135kb in size). Plus, it makes it easy to enable pre-rendering for SEO.
portfolio-2022.subDescription2: I used this framework for ease of used. DaisyUI's and Kitwind.io's libraries made it easy to generate great looking and responsive components.
portfolio-2022.subDescription3: All projects data is stored in a single JSON of key/values.
portfolio-2022.subDescription4:
Google Lighthouse measured the following mean scores across the app:
 80 Performance,
 100 Accessibility,
 100 Best Practices,
 100 SEO

bionic-advertising-systems.name: Bionic Advertising Systems
bionic-advertising-systems.description: Bionic is #1 rated media planning software + media buying software that delivers perfect media plans, beautiful flowcharts, online RFPs and IOs, flawless trafficking, delivery pacing, KPI performance monitoring, automated reconciliations, client dashboards, and more!
bionic-advertising-systems.imgAlt: screenshot of product info from Bionic Advertising Systems
bionic-advertising-systems.subDescription1: Bionic is the only fully integrated media planning and media buying software for digital, TV, radio, print, OOH, and all other media channels.
bionic-advertising-systems.subDescription2: Voted “Best Agency Tool” by iMedia. Rated 4.8/5 stars by users.
bionic-advertising-systems.subDescription3: Modern, intuitive media planning tool. If you can use Excel, you can use Bionic.
bionic-advertising-systems.subDescription4: Hassle-free. 100% cloud-based. You’ll be up and running in minutes!

advertise-with-us.name: Advertise With Us
advertise-with-us.description: Search the world's largest directory of advertising programs.
advertise-with-us.imgAlt: screenshot of product info from Advertise With Us
advertise-with-us.subDescription1: HTML+JS is delivered via SSR .jsp servlet technology to securely withhold API key.
advertise-with-us.subDescription2: Tailwind CSS was useful in generating predefined media queiries for collapsible components.
advertise-with-us.subDescription3: JSON-LD, sitemaps and other features provided for enhanced SEO.
advertise-with-us.subDescription4:
Google Lighthouse measured the following scores across the app:
 98 Performance,
 97 Accessibility,
 100 Best Practices,
 100 SEO

sonar-strike.name: Sonar Strike
sonar-strike.description: Prototype Underwater Shooter. High-speed  space shooter game made in entirely in React and JavaScript. Final project for JSCRIPT-300, React front-end development course.
sonar-strike.imgAlt: Starting page of gameplay with sonar blasting dolping on a tropical island background
sonar-strike.subDescription1: This was cloned from another game. I updated the game mechanics, styling, and menu navigation to create an entirely new look and feel.
sonar-strike.subDescription2: All game logic is written in JS.
sonar-strike.subDescription3: Gameplay only features one static level and type of enemy. It is not playable on certain devices.
sonar-strike.subDescription4: If you can keep clicking fast enough, it's pretty hard to lose!

hugos-it-consulting.name: Hugo's IT Consulting
hugos-it-consulting.description: Professional technology management services for server infrastructure configuration and operation, project management, Microsoft Windows Servers, AV, quarterly reporting, procurement, technical user documentation, and implementing organizational IT management processes.
hugos-it-consulting.subDescription1: AstroWind is a free and open-source template to make your website using Astro 2.0 + Tailwind CSS. Designed taking into account web best practices.
hugos-it-consulting.subDescription2: Thanks to Astrowind, this page has perfect scores of 100 for Performance, Accessibility, Best Practices, and SEO.
hugos-it-consulting.subDescription3: Astro provides <Image /> and <Picture> components as well as a basic image transformer, with full support for static sites and server-side rendering.
hugos-it-consulting.subDescription4: Netlify's CLI makes it easy to deploy a built webapp.
